title: I really hope Vanguards will be the next class to receive an update.
body:
Don't get me wrong, I'd love a Diving Fighter rework....

But I feel like Vanguards/tanks need it more.
Tanks right now are really fucking well rounded midgame, but are not strong at all later on.
I just hope Riot'll fix their base damage, and 
#MakeTanksTankyAgain!
later in the game.

Just a few words I wanted to get off my chest :P

replies.body:
Hmm lots of good points for Tanks vs Divers. One additional thing to consider is how unhealthy tank itemization is right now, or more specifically how tanks (and non-tanks) interact with tank items.

While I agree on a Champion level Divers need a update the most, I think on a systemic level tanks need it the most. Choices, choices....
If tank itemization is considered a problem that is effecting other classes you should do tanks. IF you do divers you are going to have to re-tune them again after the tank pass anyways.
Yeah, most Divers builds at least one or two tank items anyway.

That's because there are really no items that are for Divers specifically. If it's not an item like {{item:3071}} that Juggernauts use, it's {{item:3074}} that is used on a lot of skirmishers as well. 
It's pretty much just like how Assassins use items that they weren't supposed to cause they work better, except there isn't a clear cut set of items that target divers specifically, so you can pretty much get away with whatever works. If Divers were to get updated, they would likely get items made for them so they wouldn't need to build tank items anymore.

{{item:3056}}

She caused quite a ruckus when she first came out, then they nerfed her "too hard", apparently. Honestly, my biggest problem is her fucking voiceover. It makes me want to bite a small kitten in half.

As for Yorick, yeah, he REALLY doesn't seem like Yorick. Like, he doesn't even look like him.

Her voice is so great though! It's clearly done by the same Voice Actress that did the new Trist.

Overall the champions may not be much of what they once were, but that's what makes them so much more. They actually have a fully fleshed out play style now, where as before they had various pieces put together that just made you go "what the hell is this mess?!"

Poppy was clearly a tank assassin, when she was never meant to be that XD
My qualms with the voice-over is it destroyed her old personality for a shitty ditsy moron. I may love her kit, but I hate playing her because of the VO.
Her old voice was dull and boring. She didn't have any personality in the lines that were said.  The new one makes her much more lively.

Her old voice lines made her out to be a hardened war veteran type character, her new voice lines make her out to be an airhead. I'd rather have no voice lines than an airhead charging into fights, so her new voice over is entirely cringey. And I can hardly call a ditsy airhead 'lively'
She's far from a ditsy airhead.  She's a strong kind hearted warrior that's looking for her hero.

For example, items like Randuin's, Banshee's, and Righteous Glory would build upon stats that tanks have while providing other stats. However, if for example an assassin builds Randuin's they won't get as much out of it. Perhaps this could be your chance to kill tank assassins once and for all?
